703862f-a.text:
632-644 Court Street, west side, between Creamer and Bay Streets, as seeu  south from Lorraine Street.
August 31, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

703875f-a.text:
Creamer Street, east from Court Street, showing on the far side of Gowanus Canal the tanks of the Brooklyn Gas Company.
October 8, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
